member.name: T:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix
member.summary: A class providing some methods for manipulating matrices. Constructing an object and providing a double[,] as the argument allows use of the function SolveMatrix() which returns a double[,] in a modified reduced row echelon form. The leading coefficient is not necessarily one; however, it and the adjunct vector could be divided by the leading coefficient and then it would be in rref. Constructing this object with a string that consists of a valid chemical equation of the form CO2 + H2O = C6H12O6 + O2 allows use of the function Balance() which returns a string with the equation properly balanced in lowest terms.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.#ctor(System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Constructing an object and providing a double[,] as the argument allows use of the function SolveMatrix() which returns a double[,] in a modified reduced row echelon form. The leading coefficient is not necessarily one; however, it and the adjunct vector could be divided by the leading coefficient and then it would be in rref.
member.param: A 2-D array that you want in rref.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructing this object with a string that consists of a valid chemical equation of the form CO2 + H2O = C6H12O6 + O2 allows use of the function Balance() which returns a string with the equation properly balanced in lowest terms.
member.param: A chemical equation that you want balanced.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.indexOf(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Finds the index of the occurence of string of interest in a string array.
member.param: The string array that may contain s2.
The string whose index you wish to find.
member.returns: Returns the index of the occurence of string of interest in a string array and -1 if not found.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.indexOf(System.String[0:,0:],System.String)
member.summary: Finds the index of the occurence of string of interest in a 2-D string array.
member.param: The 2-D string array that may contain s2.
The string whose index you wish to find.
member.returns: Returns the index of the occurence of string of interest in a 2-D string array. Returns -1 if not found.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.PopulateMatrix(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String[0:,0:]},System.Int32,System.Int32,Browser.Equation)
member.summary: Fills a matrix with the values gleaned from parsing the chemical equation.
member.param: A matrix containing the elements used in a a term in the top row and the number of times each element is used in the bottom row.
The number of terms in the left side of the chemical equation.
The number of terms in the right side of the chemical equation.
The equation to be balanced.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.GetAdjunctCol
member.summary: Gets the values in the far right side of the 2-D array. These are then used to compute the solution of the matrix -- the coefficients of the terms in the equation
member.returns: Returns an array of the values in the far right column of a matrix.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.GetDiagonal
member.summary: Gets the values in the main of the 2-D array. These are then used to compute the solution of the matrix -- the coefficients of the terms in the equation
member.returns: Returns an array of the values in the main diagonal of a matrix.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.GetLCMDiagonal
member.summary: Determines the least common multiple of the values in the main diagonal of a matrix
member.returns: Returns the least common multiple of the main diagonal as a double.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.DetermineCoefficients
member.summary: Finds the coefficients to the terms from the chemical equation.
member.returns: Returns an array containg the values of the coefficients of the terms in the chemical equation.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.LCM(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Determines the least common multiple of a pair of input numbers.
member.param: One of a pair of values whose least common multiple is sought.
One of a pair of values whose least common multiple is sought.
member.returns: Returns the value, as a double, of the least common multiple of the input numbers.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.InsertCoeff(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Inserts the coefficients into the chemical equation and thereby balancing it.
member.param: An array containing the coefficients of the terms.
member.returns: Returns the balanced chemical equation as a string.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.Balance
member.summary: Balances the chemical equation.
member.returns: Returns the balanced chemical equation as a string.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.SwapRows(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Swaps two rows in the matrix based on the input values.
member.param: The index of the first row to be swapped.
The index of the second row to be swapped.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.FindAndSwap(System.Int32)
member.summary: Organizes the matrix by determining if the current row is out of place, and if so, swapping it with the appropriate row.
member.param: The index of the row that may be swapped.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.FindScalars(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the appropriate scalars from the two input rows for proper row reduction.
member.param: The index of the first row whose scalar is sought.
The index of the second row whose scalar is sought.
member.returns: Returns an array containing the scalars of the two input rows.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.GCD(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Determines the greatest common denominator of a pair of input values.
member.param: The first of a pair of values whose gcd is sought.
The second of a pair of values whose gcd is sought.
member.returns: Returns the greatest common denominator of a pair of input values.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.RowAddScalar1(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double[])
member.summary: Adds two rows of the matrix, after multiplying each by the appropriate scalar, so that the leading coefficient of one of the rows will be eliminated.
member.param: The row who will be used to eliminated the leading coefficient of the destRow.
The row whose leading coefficient will be eliminated.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.GCDofRow(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the greatest common denominator of an entire row of the matrix.
member.param: The index of the matrix whose gcd is sought.
member.returns: Returns the value of the gcd of a row of the matrix.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.ToLowestTermsR(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reduces a row to the lowest integer terms.
member.param: The index of the row to be reduced to lowest terms.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.GetSigns
member.summary: Determines the signs of the leading coefficients of each row in the matrix.
member.returns: Returs an array indicating the signs of the rows in the array.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.ToPositive
member.summary: Ensures that the leading coefficients of each row are positve and that the remaining values in the row are properly adjusted as well.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.ToLowestTermsM
member.summary: Reduces the entire matrix to the lowest integer terms.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.SolveMatrix
member.summary: Solves a matrix by performing Gaussian Elimination and then calling a separate function that performs Gauss-Jordan Elimination.
member.returns: Returns the matrix solved through Gauss-Jordan Elimination.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.FindPositionalScalars(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the scalars of particular positions in the matrix for use in reducing the matrix in Gauss-Jordan Elimination.
member.param: The index of the bottom row whose scalar is sought.
The index of the top row whose scalar is sought.
member.returns: Returns an array containg the scalars of particular positions in the matrix for use in reducing the matrix in Gauss-Jordan Elimination

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.ToRedRowEchelon
member.summary: Performs Gauss-Jordan Elmination on the matrix.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.DisplayMatrix
member.summary: Displays the values in the matrix.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.ToStringArranged
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the matrix arranged in a 2-D array fashion.
member.returns: Returns a string representation of the matrix arranged in a 2-D array fashion.

member.name: M:Browser.ChemEqnMatrix.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the matrix in a single line fashion.
member.returns: Returns a string representation of the matrix in a single line fashion.

member.name: T:Browser.Equation
member.summary: A class largely used for parsing out the terms of an unbalanced chemical equation.

member.name: M:Browser.Equation.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an equation object based on the input string.
member.param: A string representing a valid, unbalanced chemical equation.

member.name: M:Browser.Equation.GetRight
member.summary: Determines the right side of an equation.
member.returns: Returns a string array containing each of the separate terms in the right-hand side of the equation.

member.name: M:Browser.Equation.GetLeft
member.summary: Determines the left side of an equation.
member.returns: Returns a string array containing each of the separate terms in the left-hand side of the equation.

member.name: M:Browser.Equation.NumOcc(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines the number of times that a particualar sequence of characters appears in a larger string.
member.param: The string which may contain other particular substrings.
The substring of interest.
member.returns: Returns the number of times that a substring appears in a larger string.

member.name: M:Browser.Equation.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses an input string to determine what elements are in it and the number of times that element appears in it.
member.param: The string containing the elements to be parsed.
member.returns: Returns a row array containing the elements on the top row and the number of times each element appears on the bottom row, directly beneath its respective element.

member.name: M:Browser.Equation.indexOf(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Finds the index of the occurence of string of interest in a string array.
member.param: The string array that may contain s2.
The string whose index you wish to find.
member.returns: Returns the index of the occurence of string of interest in a string array and -1 if not found.

member.summary: Finds the index of the occurence of string of interest in a 2-D string array.
member.param: The 2-D string array that may contain s2.
The string whose index you wish to find.
member.returns: Returns the index of the occurence of string of interest in a 2-D string array. Returns -1 if not found.

member.summary: Formats expression and substitutes value for variable, then computes result

member.returns: Returns the result of Compute_Recursion(expression).

member.name: M:Browser.FunctionEval.Evaluate(System.String)
member.summary: Formats expression and computes result
member.param: The string that represents the expression to be evaluated.
member.returns: Returns the result of Compute_Recursion(Format(expression)).

member.name: M:Browser.FunctionEval.Compute_Recursion(System.String)
member.summary: Recursively breaks down expression string until final result can be returned
member.param: The string that represents the expression to be evaluated.
member.returns: A recursive call to Compute_Recursion or the final result if at the base case.

member.name: M:Browser.FunctionEval.Format(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces numeric characters and pre-evaluates expression with parentheses
member.param: The string that represents the expression to be formated.
member.returns: The input expression after formatting.

member.name: M:Browser.FunctionEval.Euler(System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Computes the result of Euler's method on a function with given values
member.param: The string that represents the function to be computed.
The initial x coordinate.
The initial y coordinate.
The final x value for the function to be evaluated at.
member.returns: The value of y once it holds the numberic integral of F(x).

member.summary: Computes the result of Heun's method on a function with given values

The final x value for the function to be evaluated at.
member.returns: The value of y once it holds the numberic integral of F(x).
